item.title: Android: Programmatically hide and show the keyboard
item.description: Sometimes you might want to programmatically close or also open the soft keyboard in your app. Open soft keyboard //Get EditText instance EditText editText = (EditText) findViewById(R.id.edit_text); InputMethodManager imm = (InputMethodManager) getSystemService(Context.INPUT_METHOD_SERVICE); imm.showSoftInput(editText, InputMethodManager.SHOW_IMPLICIT);
